name: Lime-Leaf Seasoning Paste
recipeIngredient: 1 stalk lemongrass, bulbous part only, thinly sliced crosswise
1 2-inch piece of ginger, peeled and coarsely chopped
4 cloves garlic, peeled and coarsely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Place half of each ingredient in a blender and process to make a fine paste. Scrape into a small bowl and repeat with the remaining ingredients. Combine the mixtures. This can be refrigerated for up to 2 weeks and can be used to marinate oily fish, chicken, turkey or veal.
